definition: loud and persistent outcry from many people, to make loud demands
details:
noun
- loud and persistent outcry from many people
= example: loud and persistent outcry from many people
= synonyms: clamoring, clamour, clamouring, hue and cry
- a loud harsh or strident noise
= synonyms: din
verb
- to make loud demands
= example: to make loud demands
= synonyms: clamour
- to utter or proclaim insistently and noisily
= example: to utter or proclaim insistently and noisily
= synonyms: clamour
- to compel someone to do something by insistent clamoring
= example: to compel someone to do something by insistent clamoring
